body_html:
Hmm...
...looking more closely at the AMDGPU backend. Unlike any of the other current supported backends, it looks like the intrinsics you're interested in are in lib/Target/AMDGPU, rather than what is in include/llvm/IR/IntrinsicsAMDGPU.td...and you're the only target that uses "-gen-intrinsic" directly. I'm guessing that this is problematic. The regular CMakeLists.txt rule for this is:
tablegen(LLVM AMDGPUGenIntrinsics.inc -gen-tgt-intrinsic)
Can you try "-gen-tgt-intrinsic" instead?

body:
Hmm...
...looking more closely at the AMDGPU backend.  Unlike any of the other current supported backends, it looks like the intrinsics you're interested in are in lib/Target/AMDGPU, rather than what is in include/llvm/IR/IntrinsicsAMDGPU.td...and you're the only target that uses "-gen-intrinsic" directly.  I'm guessing that this is problematic.  The regular CMakeLists.txt rule for this is:
tablegen(LLVM AMDGPUGenIntrinsics.inc -gen-tgt-intrinsic)
 Can you try "-gen-tgt-intrinsic" instead?
